## Minimum Requirements

-   23× Shielded cubes
-   2× Support cubes
-   2× Horizontal mirror cube
-   1× Vertical mirror cube
-   1× Light source assembly
-   1× Dichroic cube
-   1× 0.5” cube containing an f30 lens
-   3× 1” cube containing an f200+ lens
-   2× Targets (at least one per type)
-   1× Objective cube
-   1× Camera cube
-   1× xyz-Stage
